slide.title: Investor Pitch Deck
slide.notes: Welcome everyone and introduce the team briefly. Remember to highlight our key metrics.

slide.title: Our Vision

content.p: To transform e-commerce through intelligent automation that combines advanced algorithms with targeted AI applications, elevating sellers from operational complexity to strategic growth, regardless of their technical expertise or business scale.

image.src: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='800' height='450' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' fill='%23e6f2ff'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='400' cy='225' r='150' fill='%23ffffff' stroke='%230066cc' stroke-width='2'/%3E%3Ctext x='400' y='225' font-family='Arial' font-size='24' text-anchor='middle' fill='%230066cc'%3EVision Placeholder%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

p.strong: Join us in democratizing e-commerce success!

slide.notes: Explain how our vision aligns with market needs and future trends.

slide.title: The Problem

content.alert: E-commerce selling has become increasingly competitive and complex:

list.item: High barrier to entry - Professional seller tools cost $30-200/month
Data overload - Sellers struggle to make sense of marketplace data
Technical complexity - Current tools require significant expertise
Platform fragmentation - Most tools are marketplace-specific
Prohibitive pricing - 31% of Amazon sellers make under $500/month

body.quote: "Beginning sellers are priced out of professional tools, limiting their growth potential."

card.footer: ?? Based on interviews with 50+ potential customers ??

slide.notes: Highlight the severity of these problems with specific examples from customer interviews.

slide.title: Our Solution: ZSell Vision

content.p: ZSell Vision is a marketplace-agnostic product research tool that makes e-commerce success accessible to sellers of all sizes.

list.item: Pre-configured search strategies - No technical expertise required
Multi-marketplace data - Amazon, Shopify, Walmart and beyond
AI-powered analysis - Clear insights and actionable recommendations
Transparent explanations - Understanding behind every recommendation
Affordable pricing - Starting under $10/month, no annual commitment

image.src: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='800' height='450' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' fill='%23f0f0f0'/%3E%3Crect x='50' y='50' width='700' height='350' rx='10' fill='%23ffffff' stroke='%23cccccc' stroke-width='2'/%3E%3Ctext x='400' y='225' font-family='Arial' font-size='24' text-anchor='middle' fill='%23666666'%3EProduct Screenshot%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

slide.notes: Demo the key features of our solution that directly address the problems.

list.item: Guided research workflows - Step-by-step product discovery
Opportunity scoring - Simple metrics for potential profitability
Actionable recommendations - Clear next steps for implementation
Advanced data filtering - Customize search parameters
Trend identification - Spot emerging product opportunities
1.1 million active Amazon sellers in the US
Walmart marketplace tripled since 2022 to 160,000 sellers
85% of Shopify merchants use multiple apps
Most Amazon sellers use tools, but price point limits beginners
Walmart marketplace sellers increasingly seeking specialized tools
Growing demand for AI-powered analytics (34% of Amazon sellers)

slide.title: Market Opportunity

content.p: Our initial focus targets the US Amazon sellers, with plans to expand to Shopify.
content.alert: ?? Which market segment has the highest growth rate ??

slide.notes: Explain our market entry strategy and expansion plans.
